divs: Sighting DetailsI was on msn with a freind on my top bunk looking out window discusing it, lately wether has bin weird so i was looking at the clouds and saw a triangle cloud, and three stars flashed and it was threw clouds as if there was a battel or something and then i looked out my window and saw flashes as if some one was takeing pictuers of me fromthe sky. when i first saw it i knew it was something big me and my freind i will not realse his name, know something is happening we are talking this verey minuit and it did not seem to move and my feals were noraml but i ehrd sounds on my roof and looked and saw a black figuer and freaked heart pounding and shut my window and looked again it was gone. and i lost sight becuse it flashed threw the clouds.
